title: Shred Optics launch Bigshow MTB Goggles w/ strap made from recycled plastic bottles
content:
Shred Optics have added new MTB Goggles to their lineup of eyewear; the Amazify, Nastify and Soaza MTB+ Bigshow Goggles. As well as ensuring all their packaging is plastic-free, Shred are now making the goggle straps with plastic from recycled plastic bottles. Here’s a brief intro to all three.
